attributes.name: Forsworn Rapier
attributes.description: “I need nothing in life but you.”
attributes.parsed_description: “I need nothing in life but you.”

attributes.name: Forthright
attributes.description: "Direct and to the point. Take this path to victory."
attributes.parsed_description: "Direct and to the point. Take this path to victory."

attributes.name: Forward Progress
attributes.description: "Ancient scientists cared little for conflict, but they found weapons useful to further their research."
attributes.parsed_description: "Ancient scientists cared little for conflict, but they found weapons useful to further their research."

attributes.name: Foulmouth
attributes.description: "Speak the words of power and receive my gift."
attributes.parsed_description: "Speak the words of power and receive my gift."

attributes.name: Fractured Bough
attributes.description: "I heard cracks in the distance. At first I thought them to be muskets, but they were trees collapsing under the weight of winter."
attributes.parsed_description: "I heard cracks in the distance. At first I thought them to be muskets, but they were trees collapsing under the weight of winter."

attributes.name: Fragile Death
attributes.description: "Life is fleeting. Let loose one arrow and a light goes out in this cruel world."
attributes.parsed_description: "Life is fleeting. Let loose one arrow and a light goes out in this cruel world."

attributes.name: Fragile Protection
attributes.description: "My blessing will protect you. For now."
attributes.parsed_description: "My blessing will protect you. For now."

attributes.name: Fragment of Light
attributes.description: "Even the smallest candle melts away darkness."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even the smallest candle melts away darkness."

attributes.name: Freshforged Edge
attributes.description: "This axe is newly crafted from the forges of Everfall. A fine finish and a razor sharp edge makes this formidable against any foe."
attributes.parsed_description: "This axe is newly crafted from the forges of Everfall. A fine finish and a razor sharp edge makes this formidable against any foe."

attributes.name: Friend of Darkness
attributes.description: "You think darkness is your ally?"
attributes.parsed_description: "You think darkness is your ally?"

attributes.name: Frigid Gale
attributes.description: "Best bring furs. The chill cuts to the bone."
attributes.parsed_description: "Best bring furs. The chill cuts to the bone."

attributes.name: Frigid  Grip
attributes.description: "Use these to bend fate to your will."
attributes.parsed_description: "Use these to bend fate to your will."

attributes.name: From On High
attributes.description: "The hatchet glows with an otherworldly iridescence."
attributes.parsed_description: "The hatchet glows with an otherworldly iridescence."

attributes.name: Frostbite
attributes.description: "Touching the metal is enough to freeze off a finger."
attributes.parsed_description: "Touching the metal is enough to freeze off a finger."

attributes.name: Frost Bite
attributes.description: "Posessed by a vengeful frozen giest, this bow yearns to make others suffer as it had."
attributes.parsed_description: "Posessed by a vengeful frozen giest, this bow yearns to make others suffer as it had."

attributes.name: Frostbitten Fire Staff
attributes.description: “The flame lingers despite the frosty tendrils of the staff.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The flame lingers despite the frosty tendrils of the staff.”

attributes.name: Frostbitten Mitt
attributes.description: "What did it cost you? Your fingers and toes? Was it worth it?"
attributes.parsed_description: "What did it cost you? Your fingers and toes? Was it worth it?"

attributes.name: Frost Fairy's Gift
attributes.description: "And with a wink, she snapped her fingers. My hand grew cold, but with that feeling came the knowledge of creation."
attributes.parsed_description: "And with a wink, she snapped her fingers. My hand grew cold, but with that feeling came the knowledge of creation."

attributes.name: Frostfall
attributes.description: "Even more silent than snowfall, frostfall strikes without warning."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even more silent than snowfall, frostfall strikes without warning."

attributes.name: Frostfang
attributes.description: "The biting cold is surely the worst way to die."
attributes.parsed_description: "The biting cold is surely the worst way to die."

attributes.name: Frostfever
attributes.description: "A boiling fever overtook him. Ironic, that he should die like this in such a cold place."
attributes.parsed_description: "A boiling fever overtook him. Ironic, that he should die like this in such a cold place."

attributes.name: Frostforged Warhammer
attributes.description: "The entire weight of the tundra lingers behind your swing."
attributes.parsed_description: "The entire weight of the tundra lingers behind your swing."

attributes.name: Frostgrasp
attributes.description: "What appears delicate can often prove fatal."
attributes.parsed_description: "What appears delicate can often prove fatal."

attributes.name: Frostwall
attributes.description: "A winter storm ebbs and flows within you. Attune yourself to it, and you will find a font of power."
attributes.parsed_description: "A winter storm ebbs and flows within you. Attune yourself to it, and you will find a font of power."

attributes.name: Frosty Flintlock
attributes.description: "The steel is cold and brittle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The steel is cold and brittle."

attributes.name: Frozen Embrace
attributes.description: "Some people tell tales of a woman in the snow, a Yuki-onna. If you see her, stay away."
attributes.parsed_description: "Some people tell tales of a woman in the snow, a Yuki-onna. If you see her, stay away."

attributes.name: Frozen Lament
attributes.description: I cried for hours when I learned of her death.
attributes.parsed_description: I cried for hours when I learned of her death.

+12.3% Damage to Ancients.
